Phrases_key1: A group of meaningful words without a finite verb is a phrase.
Phrases_key2: Words ka ek group jisme verb nahi hai, use "phrase" kehte hain.
Phrases_key5: In spite of working hard, he could not the complete the assignment on time.
Phrases_key7: Identify the phrase in the following sentences.
Phrases_key8: The mother taught her children to listen to her words.
Phrases_key9: The nurses cared for the patients admitted to the hospital.
Phrases_key10: The fire coming from the sky frightened the tribal people.
Phrases_key11: He told them the secret of growing crops.
Phrases_key12: They used the gifts of nature to live better.
